TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICommunicationClientFactory`1<(class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ICommunicationClient) TCommunicationClient>

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that must be implemented to provide a factory for communication clients to talk to a service fabric service.
Event handler that is fired when the Communication client connects to the service endpoint.
Event handler that is fired when the Communication client disconnects from the service endpoint.

Docs.param: Specifies which replica in the partition identified by the partition key, the client should connect to
Specifies which listener in the endpoint of the chosen replica, to which the client should connect to

Docs.param: Information about exception that happened while communicating with the service.
Specifies the retry policy that should be used for handling the reported exception.
Docs.summary: Handles the exceptions that occur in the CommunicationClient when sending a message to the Service
Docs.returns: A Task that represents outstanding operation. The result of the Task is a object that provides information on retry policy for this exception.
